definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it

sentences.english: That, at the resurrection, our bodies shall be transformed into absolutely ethereal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 复活时，我们的身体将变为绝对虚无缥渺的东西。

sentences.english: He looks into the void, feeling empty.
sentences.chinese: 他眼望着虚无，感到极度空虚。

sentences.english: Do not turn to idols or make gods of cast metal for yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们不可偏向虚无的神，也不可为自己铸造神像。

sentences.english: The negation of the infinite leads straight to nihilism.
sentences.chinese: 对无极的否认会直接导向虚无主义。

sentences.english: The person is a vain statue. wear taciturnity calm.
sentences.chinese: 他是一座虚无的雕像，沉默不语。

sentences.english: The void is always elusive, having no opposite, there is nothing which excludes or opposes.
sentences.chinese: 虚无包含一切，无所不容，不存在对立与排斥。

sentences.english: For all the gods of the nations are idols, but the Lord made the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 外邦的神都属虚无，惟独耶和华创造诸天。

sentences.english: Are we not straying, as through an infinite nothing?
sentences.chinese: 在这无尽的虚无中，我们没迷路么？

sentences.english: Likewise, nobody will be there to save you from someone else’s inanity.
sentences.chinese: 同样地，也没有人会从其他人的虚无中把你拯救出来。

sentences.english: Therefore, the result of extrication is only nihility.
sentences.chinese: 所以，解脱的结果，只能是虚无。

sentences.english: This photo demonstrates the hollow, void-like quality of Fen Shen.
sentences.chinese: 这张相片示范分身空心，像虚无的空性。

sentences.english: But his ideal is in air.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的理想却是虚无飘渺的。

sentences.english: There it was, the infinitude of emptiness.
But this kind of understanding is the establishment above the illusory network.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种理解是建立在虚无缥缈的网络之上的。

sentences.english: All is well inside the cabin. But outside it is a vast expanse of nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 船舱内一切正常，而舱外是一片虚无。

sentences.english: But nothingness can only be found by feeling of dread and death.
sentences.chinese: 而虚无只有在畏和死之中才能被经验到。

definition: primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
(of dreams, hopes etc) to vanish/to evaporate/(of a person) to become disillusioned/disillusionment
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
